name: Cucumber and Tomato Salad
keywords: cucumber, red onion, tomato, summer, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the cucumbers and split them in half. Scoop out the seeds with a spoon. Slice the cucumbers crosswise. There should be about 3 cups.
Core the tomatoes and cut them into 1/2-inch cubes. There should be about 3 cups.
Put the onion, dill, vinegar, oil, cumin, salt and pepper in a bowl. Beat briskly with a wire whisk. Add the cucumbers and tomatoes. Toss well and serve.
